thread.title: Excellent Location and Friendly Staff
thread.title_full: Excellent Location and Friendly Staff - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: brambleyone
title: Excellent Location and Friendly Staff
text: If you're looking for a mid-range hotel, well placed for getting around London then this just fits the bill! Very friendly welcome, excellent breakfast choice and immaculately clean and nicely decorated. It has it's own restaurant and there are plenty of restaurants plus tube station and bus routes on the doorstep. Wouldn't hesitate to book it next time we visit the city.
